oai_dc:dc.dc:title: White baseball team
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Embracing Citizenship
Military Service
Baseball players; Baseball teams
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A picture of the white baseball team at Fort Oglethorpe.
The Fort Oglethorpe Army Post was established in 1902. It was a training facility for several different units during World War II.
